thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 13 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: SA's Competiton Tribunal Says Dismisses Massmart Complaint Against Retailers

author: Reuters Editorial
title: SA's Competiton Tribunal Says Dismisses Massmart Complaint Against Retailers

organizations.name: competiton tribunal says dismisses massmart complaint against retailers

text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - SOUTH AFRICA‘S ‍COMPETITION TRIBUNAL:
* UPHELD EXCEPTIONS TAKEN BY RETAILERS SHOPRITE CHECKERS, PICK ‘N PAY RETAILERS AND SPAR IN RESPECT OF AMENDED REFERRAL BY MASSMART​
* TRIBUNAL FOUND THAT PROBLEMS ASSOCIATED WITH REFERRAL REMAINED AND UPHELD OBJECTIONS​
* THERE WOULD BE NO PURPOSE SERVED BY ALLOWING MASSMART OPPORTUNITY TO AMEND ITS REFERRAL, IT DECIDED TO DISMISS REFERRAL WITH COSTS (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 80 6749 1136)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
